{
    "number": 274143,
    "data": "1,1,1,1,2,2,2,4,4,5,8,9,12,16,20,26,34,44,57,74,97,125,162,212,272,356,462,597,780,1010,1311,1706,2210,2873,3732,4841,6294,8168,10608,13781,17886,23237,30172,39177,50891,66072,85813,111446,144706,187947,244059,316937,411618,534503,694153,901461",
    "name": "Number of integers in n-th generation of tree T(1/3) defined in Comments.",
    "comment": [
        "Let T* be the infinite tree with root 0 generated by these rules:  if p is in T*, then p+1 is in T* and x*p is in T*.  Let g(n) be the set of nodes in the n-th generation, so that g(0) = {0}, g(1) = {1}, g(2) = {2,x}, g(3) = {3,2x,x+1,x^2}, etc.  Let T(r) be the tree obtained by substituting r for x.",
        "See A274142 for a guide to related sequences."
    ],
    "link": [
        "Kenny Lau, <a href=\"/A274143/b274143.txt\">Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..8805</a>"
    ],
    "example": [
        "For r = 1/3, we have g(3) = {3,2r,r+1, r^2}, in which only 3 is an integer, so that a(3) = 1."
    ],
    "maple": [
        "A274143 := proc(r)",
        "    local gs,n,gs2,el,a ;",
        "    gs := [2,r] ;",
        "    for n from 3 do",
        "        gs2 := [] ;",
        "        for el in gs do",
        "            gs2 := [op(gs2),el+1,r*el] ;",
        "        end do:",
        "        gs := gs2 ;",
        "        a := 0 ;",
        "        for el in gs do",
        "            if type(el,'integer') then",
        "                 a := a+1 :",
        "            end if;",
        "        end do:",
        "        print(n,a) ;",
        "    end do:",
        "end proc:",
        "A274143(1/3) ; # _R. J. Mathar_, Jun 17 2016"
    ],
    "mathematica": [
        "z = 18; t = Join[{{0}}, Expand[NestList[DeleteDuplicates[Flatten[Map[{# + 1, x*#} &, #], 1]] &, {1}, z]]];",
        "u = Table[t[[k]] /. x -> 1/3, {k, 1, z}];",
        "Table[Count[Map[IntegerQ, u[[k]]], True], {k, 1, z}]"
    ],
    "xref": [
        "Cf. A274142."
    ],
    "keyword": "nonn",
    "offset": "0,5",
    "author": "_Clark Kimberling_, Jun 11 2016",

        "More terms from _Kenny Lau_, Jul 04 2016"
